title: handle_dbapi_exception is missed on _revalidate_connection

labels.name: engine
labels.description: engines, connections, transactions, isolation levels, execution options

body:
**Migrated issue, originally created by Michael Bayer ([@zzzeek](https://github.com/zzzeek))**

this might be too risky for 0.9, here's a stack trace under 0.9.8 (the second one):
